body.p: Message Invalid character found in the request target [/ebisearch/ws/rest/biosamples?query="Aspergillus%20fumigatus"%20OR%20"Aspergillus%20spp"%20OR%20"Blastomyces%20dermatitidis"%20OR%20"Blastomyces%20parvus"%20OR%20"Candida%20albicans"%20OR%20"Candida%20spp"%20OR%20"Candida%20tropicalis"%20OR%20"Cladophialophora%20bantiana"%20OR%20"Coccidioides%20immitis"%20OR%20"Coccidioides%20posadasii"%20OR%20"Cryptococcus%20gattii%20VGI"%20OR%20"Cryptococcus%20gattii%20VGIII"%20OR%20"Cryptococcus%20neoformans%20var.%20neoformans"%20OR%20"Emmonsia%20crescens"%20OR%20"Epidermophyton%20floccosum"%20OR%20"Exophiala%20spp"%20OR%20"Fonsecaea%20compacta"%20OR%20"Fonsecaea%20pedrosoi"%20OR%20"Fusarium%20spp"%20OR%20"Geotrichum%20spp"%20OR%20"Histoplasma%20capsulatum%20var.%20capsulatum"%20OR%20"Histoplasma%20capsulatum%20var.%20duboisii"%20OR%20"Histoplasma%20capsulatum%20var.%20farciminosum"%20OR%20"Lichtheimia%20corymbifera"%20OR%20"Lomentospora%20prolificans"%20OR%20"Madurella%20mycetomatis"%20OR%20"Malassezia%20spp"%20OR%20"Microsporum%20spp"%20OR%20"Neotestudina%20rosatii"%20OR%20"Paracoccidioides%20brasiliensis"%20OR%20"Rhinocladiella%20mackenziei"%20OR%20"Rhizomucor%20pusillus"%20OR%20"Rhizopus%20microsporus"%20OR%20"Saksenaea%20vasiformis"%20OR%20"Scedosporium%20apiospermum"%20OR%20"Scedosporium%20boydii"%20OR%20"Scopulariopsis%20brevicaulis"%20OR%20"Sporothrix%20schenckii"%20OR%20"Talaromyces%20marneffei"%20OR%20"Trematosphaeria%20grisea"%20OR%20"Trichophyton%20rubrum"%20OR%20"Trichophyton%20spp"%20OR%20"Trichosporon%20spp"&fields=id,name,collection_date ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
